channel.title: Question reguarding aromr and weps
channel.description:
well from what i can tell my some of my armor and weps provide no protection... i need to know how to beef up the def and str n attack on them also how do i change what requirements are needed and how would i change the % a npc hits?? also range poons too much how do i slow the attack?
using testscape*[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2008, 10:36:16 AM[/size][hr]does no one know how to do this?
